patthana21.11:1.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:1.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:3.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.11:3.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
